Professional Summary

System Administrator with 2 years of experience managing IT infrastructure, including Active Directory, Azure, VMware, and Entra ID. Demonstrated proficiency in enhancing system efficiency and streamlining IT asset management, supporting over 170 end-users and maintaining optimal performance for virtual machines and servers. Skilled in implementing automation and compliance measures, ensuring seamless operations and minimal downtime.

Employment History

Axley Attorneys - Help Desk Technician

November 2022- August 2024


  • Provide technical support for 170 end-users, resolving over 60 tickets weekly, enhancing organization efficiency.
  • Handle licensing and manage user resources through 365 Admin and Exchange Admin, ensuring compliance.
  • Streamline IT asset management, tracking over 250 devices, ensuring timely upgrades and minimizing downtime
  • Oversee 28 Windows 11 virtual machines and 3 VMware ESXi hosts, maintaining optimal performance
  • Implement troubleshooting procedures on-site and remotely through RMM Tools (NinjaRMM and Atera)
  • Oversee new-user onboarding through Entra ID and managing MFA compliance via DUO admin/Microsoft Authenticator.
  • Develop custom Group Policy Objects to automate routine tasks, reducing manual workload and increasing productivity.

Below is a code snippet from the main custom code I wrote for this project. This code contains the api call using fetch as well as a custom loading animation sourced from Greem

            
                
const getNumberButton = document.getElementById('get-number-button');
const resultElement = document.getElementById('result');
/**********************  loader ***********************/
const loader = document.querySelector('.preload');
const emoji = loader.querySelector('.emoji');

const emojis = ["üïê", "üïú", "üïë","üïù", "üïí", "üïû", "üïì", "üïü", "üïî", "üï†", "üïï", "üï°", "üïñ", "üï¢",  "üïó", "üï£", "üïò", "üï§", "üïô",  "üï•", "üïö", "üï¶",  "üïõ", "üïß"];

const interval = 125;

const loadEmojis = (arr) => {
    setInterval(() => {
    emoji.innerText = arr[Math.floor(Math.random() * arr.length)];
    //console.log(Math.floor(Math.random() * arr.length))
    }, interval);
}

const init = () => {
    loadEmojis(emojis);
}
init();
document.querySelector(".preload").style.display = "none"//stop the load
getNumberButton.addEventListener('click', async () => {
    document.querySelector(".preload").style.display = "block"//show the load
    try {
    const response = await fetch('https://pagespeedcheck.azurewebsites.net/api/http_trigger', {
        method: 'GET'
    });

    if (!response.ok) {
        throw new Error(`HTTP error! status: ${response.status}`);
    }
    
    const number = await response.text();
    document.querySelector(".preload").style.display = "none"//stop the load
    resultElement.textContent = `Google Page Speed Result: ${number}`;
    } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error fetching number:', error);
    resultElement.textContent = 'Error retrieving number.';
    }
});
